name: Shadow's Bullet
description:
The game was made in under 8 weeks by 6 students from Belgium as an end-of-class project during a video game professional workshop given by Technocité.

Designers

  • Egon Rivera Fernandez (Lead Game Design)
  • Nicolas Blondiau (Game, Level Designer)

Programmers

  • Lory Colonius (Lead Programmer)
  • Jean Mourmeaux (Programmer, Video Editing)

Artists

  • Maxime Helin (3D Environment, Props Artist)
  • Mathieu Blairon (Character, UI Artist)
Credits

Music : Impact Prelude by Kevin MacLeod

Animations from Mixamo.com
